overview:
Visionary Entrepreneur on internet & mobile communication markets edge. He’s interests are in:

  • advertising
  • mobile surfing experience (search, listing etc)
  • dating and IM
  • social networking
  • proximity communications

Founded in 2005 Wapstart - Russia’s largest mobile advertising network. In 2010, lounched a new project - Ohmyconf.

Known as one of the few Russian specialists in the field of mobile advertising and communication.
